page.title: 11LOCAL NEWS 1984-5
page.content: DICOT IS SERVICED BY 6 LOCAL PAPERS-DIDCOT HERALD, STAR, COURIER, MAIL, MERCURY AND OXFORD JOURNAL. THE MAIL IS THE ONLY DAILY NEWSPAPER. THE OTHERS WEEKLY. ON AVERAGE OVER 50% OF EACH IS DEVOTED TO ADVERTS. ABOUT ONE PAGE IS SPORT AND APPROX.7 PAGES ARE DEVOTED TO LOCAL NEWS. THE THREE MAIN EVENTS OF THE YEAR WERE: THE 150TH ANNIVERSARY OF THE G.W.R. WAS CELEBRATED AT DIDCOT RAILWAY STATION 18TH MAY TO 2ND JUNE 1985.MR.C.JENNINGS,DRESSED AS ISAMBARD KINGDOM BRUNEL,WELCOMED SIMON GROOM FROM BLUE PETER WHO OPENED THE CELEBRATIONS. AXE-MAN ATTACK.MR.R.BAILEY WAS VICIOUSLY ATTACKED WHILE HE WAS SLEEPING.THE ATTACKER WAS JAILED FOR A TOTAL OF 4 YEARS. CONT.
